Let Stacy help you with your banking questions! Stacy is a virtual assistant that can assist you with your banking needs and questions anytime. Chat with Stacy today!

Standard Chartered Bank connects you to the Faster Payment System (FPS)! You can

• Experience a faster and easier way to apply for Travel Insurance in SC Mobile App and stay up to date with the latest promotional offer.
• Trade at real-time FX rates via the new 24/7 Online Foreign Exchange platform.

• Pay in a fun and cool style! Delight your friends with SCBHK exclusive animated stickers created by popular illustrators upon each payment done by SC Pay. The more you send, the more stickers you can unlock!
• Experience a faster and easier way to ap
Open an Integrated Deposits account anytime, anywhere! Your account can be opened as soon as same day and you can enjoy a wide array of Online / Mobile Banking and ATM services.
Introduce CNY-themed stickers for you to send lucky money to your beloved ones via SC Pay (FPS)
New “Scan and Pay” function enables you to simply scan a QR code to pay your merchants, friends or utility bills with SC Pay (FPS)

• New “Scan and Pay” function enables you to simply scan a QR code to pay your merchants, friends or utility bills with SC Pay (FPS)
• Selected life Insurance is now available for application on SC Mobile.Experience a straight-through application with

Now you can enjoy cardless cash withdrawal with QR Cash!

Registration is simple with just a few clicks to input contact phone number and select account for payment and you are good to go!

- Download SC Mobile and register the Government HKD10,000 Cash Payout Scheme. You can win a chance to double up your cash!
